testimonials.name: Rahul Singh
testimonials.quote: The English and programming courses helped me secure a job at a top tech company. The mentors were always available to clear my doubts.

testimonials.name: Priya Kumari
testimonials.quote: As someone from a Hindi medium school, I was nervous about my English skills. The interactive lessons made learning fun and effective.

testimonials.name: Amit Kumar
testimonials.quote: The job portal connected me directly with employers looking for freshers. I got three interview calls within a week of completing my course!
